headline: Tesla Stock Recaptures $1 Trillion. After Wall Street Weighs in on EV Tax-Credits.
summary: The electric-vehicle purchase tax credit makes buying Teslas and other electric vehicles more affordable for most car buyers.

raw.headline: Tesla Stock Recaptures $1 Trillion. After Wall Street Weighs in on EV Tax-Credits.
raw.summary: The electric-vehicle purchase tax credit makes buying Teslas and other electric vehicles more affordable for most car buyers.

headline: Ford (F) Post Q3 Earnings: Buy, Sell, or Hold?
summary: Over the past six months, Ford has fallen to $11.12 per share. Shareholders have lost 9.8% of their capital, which is highly disappointing because the S&P 500 has climbed 11.2%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

raw.headline: Ford (F) Post Q3 Earnings: Buy, Sell, or Hold?
raw.summary: Over the past six months, Ford has fallen to $11.12 per share. Shareholders have lost 9.8% of their capital, which is highly disappointing because the S&P 500 has climbed 11.2%. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.

headline: Ford hit with $165M penalty from NHTSA, second-highest in agency's history
summary: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration hit Ford with the second-largest civil penalty in its history, saying the automaker failed to recall vehicles in a timely manner.

raw.headline: Ford hit with $165M penalty from NHTSA, second-highest in agency's history
raw.summary: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration hit Ford with the second-largest civil penalty in its history, saying the automaker failed to recall vehicles in a timely manner.

headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Ford Hit With $165M Fine For Recall Delay
summary: NHTSA slaps Ford with $165M fine for failing to timely issue recall. GM's Cruise to pay $500,000 fine for false report on car crash. Hims & Hers cut to underperform over Amazon competition.

raw.headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Ford Hit With $165M Fine For Recall Delay
raw.summary: NHTSA slaps Ford with $165M fine for failing to timely issue recall. GM's Cruise to pay $500,000 fine for false report on car crash. Hims & Hers cut to underperform over Amazon competition.
